name: Bleep Space
description:
Click and tap to create a noisy beat, then watch it come alive in a stark geometric world.

Bleep Space combines the distinct electronic noise-pop of Dan Friel with the abstract procedural visuals of Andy Wallace. Pressing different parts of the screen will spark swirling geometric shapes and saw-wave samples that loop and form a beat, all set in a stylish, monochromatic space.

Experimentation is prioritized over perfection. Bleep Space is meant for music lovers of all skill levels.

Bleep Space was a finalist at the 2017 IndieCade International Festival of Independent Games.

Also available on iOS and in a custom arcade enclosure currently touring NYC.
More info at bleepspace.com.
Press kit here.

Source code: https://github.com/andymasteroffish/sequencer_visuals

Programming and visuals by Andy Wallace
Audio by Dan Friel

Logo by Chris Hernandez
Photos by Crystal Brackett
